node.html: Understanding the 21st-century Chinese feminist movements through its dilemmas.
4 projects that I and my partner did for CS 214: Systems Programming.

A detailed implementation of Kernel Principal Component Analysis (KPCA) in Python, demonstrating the use of polynomial and Gaussian kernels for transforming datasets. The project includes calculating kernel matrices, centering them, and extracting principal components based on eigenvalues to visualize data in reduced dimensions.

A matrix calculator program written in C that performs a variety of matrix operations, including addition, subtraction, scalar multiplication, matrix multiplication, and transposition. It features a user-friendly command-line interface and supports both custom and randomly generated default matrices.

A command-line implementation of the Wordle game written in MIPS assembly, which features modular design, user interaction, and precise control flow logic. Players can guess words with feedback for correct letters and positions. The game includes a debug mode for testing and a database of predefined words.

frontmatter.title: A Review of Extracurricular Reading Among Chinese College Students

node.html: This essay reviews extracurricular reading habits of Chinese college students, analyzing motivations, content preferences, and media usage. Read more in the full text.
